text: 2.12 Gal 6.2, Jem 1.25-26, 1 Pi 2.16 Anɨb ak takaw tɨtay agnɨg akaŋ, tap tɨtay gɨnɨg, gos anɨb ak nɨgɨnɨmɨb. God takaw teplep yɨbɨl ak nɨbop gek, tap si tap tɨmel gep ak kelɨgɨl koŋɨm amebɨm ak, God takaw anɨb ak nɨŋɨd, nɨbop tɨg asɨk bɨlokɨnɨgab. Anɨgɨl gos nɨŋɨd, takaw agɨl tap okok gɨl gɨnɨmɨb.
